page.title: 13Employment
page.content: Mainly agriculture, farmers employing farm workers and ancilliary employment, agricultural engineers and suppliers, haulage, land drainage and fertiliser suppliers. There are a number of self employed including shopkeepers, publicans, coach proprietors, caravan park owners, haulage proprietors and a timber merchant. Extra employment is created in the summer by tourists and fishermen. Some people commute to local towns to work including teachers office workers and power station employees. There are a number of unemployed and once an older person becomes unemployed it is usually impossible to find work again.There is no work for the young in the area.Women who work in the area are mainly domestics or seasonally employed on farms.
